summary: Tested placeholder replacement functionality for 2tick.kz digital contracts platform. The fix for PARTY_B placeholders (PARTY_B_NAME, PARTY_B_IIN, PARTY_B_PHONE) is working correctly. Backend correctly extracts signer_name, signer_phone from placeholder_values. Frontend correctly displays filled placeholders with emerald highlighting.
critical_code_review_comments: The placeholder replacement logic in ContractDetailsPage.js (replacePlaceholders function) correctly handles both {{KEY}} and [Label] format placeholders
Backend update_signer_info endpoint correctly extracts PARTY_B_NAME, PARTY_B_PHONE, PARTY_B_IIN from placeholder_values and copies to signer_name, signer_phone, signer_iin fields
Legacy placeholder keys (NAME2, PHONE_NUM, ID_CARD) are also supported for backward compatibility
seed_data_creation: Created test contracts with PARTY_B placeholders via API tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: Placeholder replacement fix verified working. Test contracts created: dc434678-5329-4413-abb8-e0d03d81a5f4 (with filled PARTY_B placeholders). The fix correctly: 1) Backend extracts signer_name/phone from PARTY_B_NAME/PHONE in placeholder_values, 2) Frontend displays filled placeholders with emerald highlighting, unfilled with amber. Twilio SMS is MOCKED.
